name: Agentforce Voice Chat
description: A voice-enabled Progressive Web App for Salesforce Agentforce conversations

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for fallback functionality

SALESFORCE_DOMAIN_URL.description: Your Salesforce org domain URL (e.g., https://yourdomain.my.salesforce.com)

SALESFORCE_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Salesforce Connected App Consumer Key for Agentforce

SALESFORCE_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Salesforce Connected App Consumer Secret for Agentforce

SALESFORCE_SPEECH_DOMAIN_URL.description: Salesforce domain URL for Speech Foundations (can be same as main domain)

SALESFORCE_SPEECH_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Connected App Consumer Key for Speech Foundations

SALESFORCE_SPEECH_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Connected App Consumer Secret for Speech Foundations
